p: Bats host a reservoir of various zoonotic viruses, including coronaviruses. Regulatory studies and phylogenetic analyzes have shown that there is a high genetic diversity among SARS‐like viruses in bats, allowing for the recombination and evolution of new species. It has been shown that the bat virus with 96% nucleotide sequence similarity to human SARS‐CoV can use human ACE2 as a receptor. This represents the same state of entry into the cell as human SARS‐CoV.
